::Darkmouse::

Darkmouse looks down at the table, feeling honored and guilty at the 
same time. Honored that DrillBit considered her family, and guilty 
that she might cause bots to die.

"Yeah, I guess so," was all she said.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He looked at Dark Mouse.
> "We are all a family. And I know you dont like to be the cause of 
this,
> but we wont let family be taken. We will fight for you. I'd rather 
die
> then let you or anyone els be taken."
